excerpt: "“They were the only company that cited actual revenue and tailwinds from AI. They said they had a 300-basis point tailwind, so 3% added growth to Azure because of AI,” Vellante said. “Azure was up 28% in constant currency, which is faster than the previous quarter. I mean, its productivity businesses is up double digits. Even their PCs are up.”"
